task: Give me a list of things I need to do to scaffold UI

planning.name: agent-goals-audience
planning.objective: Define target users, core user flows, content priorities, and design/accessibility constraints the UI must satisfy.

planning.name: agent-stack-setup
planning.objective: Select the UI framework and supporting libraries, then define the initial project setup standards (styling approach, routing, state, linting, and testing baseline).

planning.name: agent-build-order
planning.objective: Create an ordered scaffold checklist for layout foundation, reusable components, page shells, navigation, and mock data integration.

planning.name: agent-readiness-review
planning.objective: Establish pre-feature quality checks for responsive behavior, accessibility compliance, performance budget, and documentation completeness.

agents.name: agent-build-order
agents.objective: Create an ordered scaffold checklist for layout foundation, reusable components, page shells, navigation, and mock data integration.
